response.overview: Despite having been eliminated as a contestant on "The Voice," the popular musical reality TV show, Luc is certain of one thing: wthin three years, he'll become a millionaire. To achieve his goal, he participates in personal and business development seminars where coaches promise to teach him the secrets of success. At the same time, he becomes involved in a mysterious online business that assures him a fortune without leaving his home. Will Luc's dream of becoming a millionaire become a reality?
response.title: The Coach Machine
